overview:
Independent developer with extensive client list and track record of successfully implemented projects.

Tim is a Veteran RIA programmer with expert-level expertise in ActionScript based technologies, as well as a variety of back-end and supporting technologies and tools.

Team leader, lead programmer and architect for numerous large projects at companies of all sizes. Tim has written software and assisted in development of strategies that has helped companies get acquired, keeps startups in business, and helps Fortune 500 companies explore and establish new directions for delivery of their digital media assets.

Currently sole proprietor of Tcoz Tech Services, writer of Tcoz Tech Wire, and involved in a startup that will be submitted to CrunchBase in the near future.
